attributes.review: I downloaded this app to please the only one Iâ€™ll ever love, Donald trump. I was so excited to please him with my app but when I downloaded it and opened it for the first time it kept asking me questions I donâ€™t understand like my phone number. I donâ€™t even know what that is and frankly Iâ€™m angry that it asked me. It also uses location in the background even when the app is not open. I support the one true lord Donald rump but I donâ€™t understand why he wants to know where I am? Why does donald want to follow me? I donâ€™t appreciate this invasion of privacy. Deleting app immediately so I donâ€™t have to deal with what a phone number is

attributes.review: "If you or a loved one was diagnosed with Mesothelioma you may be entitled to financial compensation. Mesothelioma is a rare cancer linked to asbestos exposure. Exposure to asbestos in the Navy, shipyards, mills, heating, construction or the automotive industries may put you at risk. Please don't wait, call 1-800-99 LAW USA today for a free legal consultation and financial information packet. Mesothelioma patients call now! 1-800-99 LAW USA

attributes.review: I downloaded the app, scrolled through it checking out the different options and pages only to realize this app lied to me. I thought I'd be able to support our beloved president but instead all I saw was a cheeto in all the photos and videos. Not sure if there's a glitch in the app code but the first impression was a let down. This was a distasteful prank in part of the coder or coders. Must have been just one coder because how could multiple people let this disgrace happenğŸ˜’. It's just made me hungry tbhğŸ˜© I want cheetos now.
